comments.content: I can't believe I can't find it, it looks so familiar. But it doesn't appear to be a [Blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125100821/http:/www.blambot.com/) or Pizzadude creation, and I can't find it anywhere on DaFont or MyFonts. But Blambot should have ample alternatives if you can't find this.
